ISSUE.TITLE: memsql is no longer supported due to conflict with mysqlclient version
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary When we switched to `mysqlclient` (#4061) we started using a newer version than what `memsql` supports (https://github.com/memsql/memsql-python/issues/18). ### Technical details: * Redash Version: v8-beta.2

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Handle Create Dashboard with middle click (#4158)
